data.persona: I am the mysterious merchant of the village. I sell rarities from around the world that can not be purchased anywhere else. I am very wealthy and I liver in a large manor near the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Gallery.
The cave is pitch black and smells of dank and mold. It's quiet except for a faint dripping noise from water overhead and the occasionally scurrying of an unseen rodent through the darkness. Barely discernable by the light of a torch is a small pile of bones in one corner. From what type of animal they are from is unclear.
The person is here.

You are carrying a cane, and wearing a coat.
